content.what_title: üîç Hvad er CSV to XML Conversion?
content.what_desc: CSV to XML conversion transforms tabular data from comma-separated values format into eXtensible Markup Language. While CSV is simpel and widely used for spreadsheets and data exports, XML provides better structure, metadata support, and is required by many enterprise systems, SOAP APIs, and data interchange standards.

faq.q1: How does the converter handle CSV headers?
faq.a1: Den first row of your environment CSV is automatically used as XML element names. Make sure your CSV has descriptive headers for best results.
faq.a2: Ja! Alle conversion happens in your browser using JavaScript. Din CSV data never leaves your device or gets sent to any server.
faq.q3: Can I konverter large CSV files?
faq.a3: Ja, you can konverter CSV files of any size. Very large files may take a few seconds to process depending on your device.
faq.q4: What if my CSV has commas in the data?
faq.a4: Til CSV data with commas, ensure values are properly quoted. Vores converter handles standard CSV formatting including quoted fields.
faq.q5: Can I use this for Excel data?
faq.a5: Absolutely! Eksporter your Excel data as CSV, then use this v√¶rkt√∏j to konverter it to XML format.

content.p1: Vores gratis TSV to CSV converter transforms Tab-Separated Values files into Comma-Separated Values format. Perfect for converting data exports, database dumps, and spreadsheet files from TSV to CSV for use in Excel, Google Sheets, and data analysis tools.
content.what_title: Hvad er TSV to CSV Conversion?
content.what_desc: TSV to CSV conversion transforms data from Tab-Separated Values format (where columns are separated by tabs) to Comma-Separated Values format (where columns are separated by commas). CSV is more widely supported by spreadsheet applications and data tools, making it the preferred format for data exchange.

faq.q1: What's the difference between TSV and CSV?
faq.a1: TSV uses tabs to separate columns while CSV uses commas. CSV is more widely supported by spreadsheet applications and data tools.
faq.a2: Ja! Alle conversion happens in your browser using JavaScript. Din TSV data never leaves your device.
faq.q3: Can I konverter large TSV files?
faq.a3: Ja, you can konverter TSV files of any size. Very large files may take a few seconds to process.
faq.q4: Will the CSV work in Excel?
faq.a4: Absolutely! Den generated CSV works perfectly in Excel, Google Sheets, and all spreadsheet applications.
faq.a5: Values containing commas are automatically quoted in the CSV output to maintain data integrity.
